comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content: Alan George Evans was born in the December quarter of 1894 in the Stoke-upon-Trent Registration District. According to the 1901 census, he was the son of Samuel Pope Evans (born 1860, Hanley, Staffordshire), a commercial traveller in sanitary wares, and Ada Louisa, nee Jenks (born 1865, Wolverhampton, Staffordshire) Source Citation: Class: RG13; Piece: 2574; Folio: 63; Page: 8. His service record can be accessed here: search.ancestry.co.uk/cgi-bin/sse.dll?db=BritishArmyServi...

comment.author: 79212979@N03
comment._content: CWGC lists the following details Rank:Lance Corporal Service No:2679 Date of Death:01/06/1915 Age:20 Regiment/Service:North Staffordshire Regiment "F" Coy. 1st/5th Bn. Grave ReferenceIV. C. 5. CemeteryR.E. FARM CEMETERY Additional Information: Son of Samuel P. and Ada L. Evans, of 6, Clive St., Shelton, Stoke-on-Trent. They can be seen here www.cwgc.org/search-for-war-dead/casualty/102445/EVANS,%2... A photo of his grave can be found here twgpp.org/information.php?id=1621775
